keywords:
Operation Gladio
SECRET ARMIES
SERIES: CONTEMPORARY SECURITY STUDIES
This book tells the story of NATO's secret anti-Communist stay-behind armies that were
set up by the CIA and Mi6 after the Second World War in all countries of Western
Europe and that in some countries became tragically linked to right-wing terrorism.
NATO's Secret Armies: Operation GLADIO and Terrorism in Western Europe
